hero.name: Ramesh Nelikil
hero.headline: Customer-Focused Engineering & AI Leader | Innovation, Scalable Platforms & Operational Excellence

experience.role: Software Engineering Director — Order Fulfillment (Supply Chain)

highlights: Defined and executed the global roadmap for digital order fulfillment supporting ~30% of digital revenue; balanced customer experience, scalability, and cost.
Modernized the platform by consolidating 100+ microservices, reducing cloud spend by ~30% and maintenance costs by ~40%, delivering ~$1.2M annual savings.
Partnered with business and product stakeholders to define product vision and translate it into actionable technology solutions aligned with organizational goals.
Led cloud migrations of on-prem solutions to align with cloud strategy, improving scalability and simplifying long-term maintenance.
Applied strong analytical and problem-solving skills to simplify complex systems, reduce technical debt, and design innovative solutions that improved performance, reliability, and time-to-delivery.
Championed AI enablement (GitHub Copilot, AI agents) to accelerate testing and automate repo upgrades (4 weeks → 3 days).
Built and coached high-performing global teams; partnered with product/business across US, China, India, and Europe to align priorities and execution.
Promoted a culture of innovation and continuous improvement, empowering teams to experiment with AI-driven tools that enhanced both delivery speed and engineering quality.
